alert.note: Alert for Huerfano (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:54PM MDT until June 11 at 12:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUERFANO AND WEST CENTRAL LAS ANIMAS COUNTIES... At 154 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Aguilar, or 21 miles north of Trinidad, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aguilar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
